column4: A couple of unrelated questions. I am running lucid lynx on my 6 yr old laptop. I just wanted to know if it is a good idea to upgrade to the next lts or not. I get the idea that it is not good to do it when very new coz of the bugs and issues. Is now a good time?

could you elaborate plz. Does the newer version solve some specific or different needs as opposed to lucid. I mean what are the specifics I should consider when deciding. I was just going for the latest and the support period for the next few yrs.
yes, the newer version use different environment compared to old.. and maybe need some more capable hardware..thats commonly happen.
